title: For Sale: SGC-Graded N172s / Old Judges: Keefe, etc.

posts.post_title: For Sale: SGC-Graded N172s / Old Judges: Keefe, etc.
posts.post_content:
Five N172 Old Judge cards for sale:

Keefe (HOF) (bat near vertical pose, I believe) SGC 10 - $250.00
Flood SGC 40 - $150.00
Art Whitney SGC 40 - $150.00
G. Whitney SGC 30 - $125.00

All prices PPFF (add 3% for regular PP)
